frameDefinitions: This frame refers to clothing and its characteristics,  including anything that people conventionally wear.
A Terrorist commits a violent or otherwise harmful Act upon a Victim in order to coerce or terrorize a government or populace.
A Cognizer decides upon the Chosen (either an item or a course of action) out of a set of  Possibilities .
An Assailant attacks a Victim, intending to die in the process.
This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, with respect to their Religion.
A Combatant is declared or loyal to a Side in a military Conflict.
frameExamples: Claudia dressed in a dark green cotton <t>DRESS</t> clasped round her slender waist with a broad yellow belt , drank a cup of coffee and opened her neglected post .
Their <t>terrorism</t> against civilians will not be tolerated.
The council <t>picked</t> you out of all the pilots available to head this mission.
The terrorist <t>suicide attack</t> on U.S. troops early last week caused more damage than initially reported.
The bells call the <t><fex name='Person'>faithful</fex></t> to evensong DNI
A 20-year=old Argentinian <t>guerilla</t> was firing at our squad.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifes the clothing worn.
The <fen>Terrorist</fen> commits the <fen>Act</fen> of terror for political or ideological gains.
The <fen>Act</fen> is the harmful action performed by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> or terrorist organization.
The <fen>Victim</fen> is most directly affected or harmed by the <fen>Act</fen> of terrorism.
The location in time when the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
The location where the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen> out of the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.
<fen>Chosen</fen> identifies the entity or course of action which is selected from among the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.

A <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a choice from among a set of <fen>Possibilities</fen>. <fen>Possibilities</fen> are commonly expressed via an oblique phrase which indicates the alternative or alternatives, or by a subordinate clause (choosing to do it or choosing not to do it), typically headed by 'whether or 'if'.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the choosing occurs.
This <fen>Victim</fen> is the being or entity that is injured by the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s suicide attack.
The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Assailant</fen> attacks the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Assailant</fen> makes an assault on the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The religious belief system that the <fen>Person</fen> follows.
The <fen>Combatant</fen> is the human being involved in combat.
listRoleExamples: Several domestic <fex>terrorists</fex> were operating from the site during the mid 1990s.
Many have suffered due to their acts of <fex><t>terrorism</t></fex>.
Cowardly acts of terrorism <fex>upon innocent men, women, and children</fex> is not a doorway to Heaven, but a gateway to Hell.
<fex>We</fex>have to pick a colour for the living room.
I decided <fex>to give it another try</fex>.
They chose their new guitarist <fex>out of more than 300 auditioners</fex>.
I was n't chosen <fex>in the last round</fex>.
The winner was selected <fex>in the secret meeting room</fex>.
Her suicide attack <fex>on the guardsmen</fex> was the third such attack in the last month.
<fex>The group's</fex> suicide attacks continue to affect troop morale.
<fex>Last Tuesday's</fex> suicide attack killed seven and wounded 20.
Last week's suicide bombing <fex>outside the city</fex> was the first in weeks.
